model_answer: The answer is B: Event 10: The narrator details WWE’s plans and Warrior’s 1996 feuds and abrupt exit after claiming WWE breached their deal, highlighting unreliability before the interview. This event directly caused JR’s stance as it highlighted the issues with Warrior's reliability and character that led to his sudden departure from WWE.

The direct cue that sets up the on-screen appearance of the red title card for “7 Kevin Nash” is option B: The narration audibly highlights “Number seven” as the Rob Van Dam segment closes, priming the transition to the next entry. This indicates that the number seven is significant and will be followed by another entry, which in this case is Kevin Nash.
